snippet.title: Lighthaze World (Official Trailer)  - The COZIEST Puzzle Game You Will Ever Play
snippet.description:
Lighthaze World: A Serene Puzzle Adventure: Embark on a heartwarming journey with Nym and their loyal canine companion, Chewy. Start in a peaceful park, but when hunger strikes, the bustling Lighthaze World mall becomes a daunting obstacle. Nym, an anxious hero, must navigate this overwhelming space to find food for Chewy.
As Nym's anxiety takes hold, their perception of the mall shifts, transforming into a serene Tasmanian wilderness. Explore lush forests, sandy beaches, towering mountains, and hidden hinterlands, all while solving puzzles and collecting items. Can you help Nym overcome their fears and find their way through this unique world?
Will you guide Nym to success and ensure Chewy gets their much-needed meal?
Wishlist today - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1747190/Lighthaze_World/
